summary: Results-driven analyst with 8+ years across federal and private sectors. Specializes in data-driven policy analysis, program evaluation, and process improvement with measurable outcomes.

work.title: Management and Program Analyst
work.duties: Plan, analyze, and evaluate program operations for multiple grant portfolios.
highlights: Led cross-functional sprint to streamline grants intake, cutting cycle time 35% (21 → 14 days).
Built Power BI dashboards used weekly by SES to monitor KPIs across 5 programs.
Authored SOPs and training for 60+ staff, improving compliance audit pass rate from 82% to 97%.

work.title: Data Analyst
highlights: Designed ETL to consolidate 12 data sources, reducing manual prep by 10 hrs/week.
Delivered A/B testing insights that increased conversion rate 8% QoQ.
Partnered with client executives to define metrics; shipped 15 dashboards across business units.

training: Agile Project Management — Practitioner Workshop (16 hrs)
publications: Example A., 2020. Data-Driven Program Evaluation, Journal of Analytics.

highlights: Coordinated 30+ volunteers monthly; increased distribution capacity by 20%.
